title: Game mode idea!
body: I just wanted to share this game mode idea I came up with today. The location is a small map like the Twisted Treeline or even the Howling Abyss. The game mode should be fast-paced with a lot of action and brawling. The fun part is that either everyone on both teams play the same champs which makes it a skill match, or both teams have 5 different champions but the 5 different champions are the same on both teams. Share your thoughts!

replies.body:
You just described OfA Mirror from last year. Except in the case where it's 5 different champs. That would be ARAM mirror, which hasn't happened yet, but still doesn't sound like a big enough leap from what we already have to warrent consideration though.

I would like a game mode though where each team picks the OTHER team's champs. That would be sadistic, but funny.
Seems kinda pointless tbh...also could easily just be made in a custom game for different champs, otherwise we already see those mirror matches sometimes in the current featured game mode.
